name: TeleDash
description:
This game was meant to be entered in the 13th Low Effort Game Jam, but, unfortunately I was silenced by the corporate shills that invented *D E A D L I N E S*. I am taking a firm stance against this practice and hope this project will help people see my point of view.

Teleport and Dash in this singular level and win the right to speak with the great and benevolent purple person who is not evil.

Some issues I'm aware of:

Sound effects often repeat;

The boss fight has a few glaring flaws caused by spaghetti coding;

Transitions between scenes aren't very smooth;

The difficulty is all over the place.
